Languages.Language 1: Understands the languages of its creator but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 19 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Golem makes 2 Slam attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Slow, The Golem targets creatures it can see, those creatures making a Wisdom saving throw.  Creatures that are unable to resist the magic are unable to use reactions, their speed is halved, and they can not make more than 1 attack on its turn.  They can also only use either their Action or Bonus Action, not both

Abilities.Ability 1: Immutable Form, The Golem is immune to spells that would alter its form
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Golem's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Immunities.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with Adamantine weapons
